mapper.select:
SELECT d.*,u.* FROM aoa_director_users AS u LEFT JOIN aoa_director AS d ON d.director_id = u.director_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} AND u.director_id is NOT null AND u.is_handle=1
AND d.pinyin LIKE '${pinyin}%'
AND u.catelog_name = '${outtype}'
AND (d.user_name LIKE '%${baseKey}%' OR d.phone_number LIKE '%${baseKey}%' OR d.companyname LIKE '%${baseKey}%' OR d.pinyin LIKE '${baseKey}%' OR u.catelog_name LIKE '%${baseKey}%' )
order by u.catelog_name
